name: Evil?Twins Kisikil-Lilla
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or GY) by Tributing 2 Link Monsters. If this card is Special Summoned: You can make your opponent send cards they control to the GY until they control 2. You can only use this effect of "Evil?Twins Kisikil-Lilla" once per turn. Gains 2200 ATK/DEF while there is a "Kisikil" monster and a "Lilla" monster in your GY.
